price: 有经典的人啊！你们明知安拉的迹象是真实的，你们为什么不信那些迹象呢？
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-antum tashhadūna
